short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your browser with Safety Web, which blocks tracking, remove ads, and guards against malicious activity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Safety Web - Adblocker for Web is a powerful browser extension designed to enhance your online experience by blocking intrusive ads and ensuring a safer, cleaner browsing environment. With its advanced ad-blocking capabilities, it prevents pop-ups, banner ads, video ads, and other disruptive advertisements from cluttering your web pages, allowing for faster loading times and improved browsing performance.

Safety Web also offers protection against tracking cookies, malicious scripts, and phishing attempts, safeguarding your privacy as you navigate the internet. Its user-friendly interface makes it easy to customize settings and whitelist trusted websites. Whether you're looking to boost security or enjoy a distraction-free browsing experience, the extension is your all-in-one solution for a safer, more enjoyable web.
